output:

---

```{r, order = 0}
litedown::reactor(echo = FALSE)
# package description
pkg_name = local({
    old <- setwd("../pkg")
    tryCatch(litedown:::detect_pkg(), finally = setwd(old))
})
pkg_path = attr(pkg_name, 'path')
litedown::pkg_desc(pkg_name)
```

You can install the latest release of grates from [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/) with:

```{r, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("grates")
```

A brief overview of grates is available [online](https://www.reconverse.org/grates/vignette.html) and in the vignette distributed with the package:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
vignette("grates")
```
